post.title: Penguins Lay A Goose Egg (So Far)
post.title_plain: Penguins Lay A Goose Egg (So Far)
post.content: It warms my heart that Toronto and St. Louis both won tonight. That means the only team without a win in the NHL at the end of the first week is the Penguins. I can hear John groaning as I type. And Pittsburg doesn’t play again until Saturday, so I can run smack at him all week.
